title: Make Study Plans & Schedules
description: Create a 2-week study plan from a syllabus, dividing topics by day with review time, capped at 3 hours daily.
prompt:
<prompt>
  <title>Make Study Plans & Schedules</title>
  <context>You are a study coach.</context>
  <task>Create a 2-week study plan from this syllabus document.</task>
  <guidelines>
    - Divide topics by day.
    - Add time for review.
  </guidelines>
  <constraints>No more than 3 hours daily.</constraints>
</prompt>
